casebody.data:
SECURITY GENERAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee, v. UNIVERSAL UNDERWRITERS, Appellant. No. 11302. United States Court of Appeals Fourth Circuit. Argued Nov. 7, 1967. Decided Nov. 13, 1967. Julian B. Salley, Jr., Aiken, S. C. (Henderson, Salley, Cushman & Bodenheimer, Aiken, S. C., on brief), for appellant. John H. Williams, Aiken, S. C. (Williams & Johnson, Aiken, S. C., on brief), for appellee.

Before SOBELOFF and BRYAN, Circuit Judges, and MARVIN JONES* Senior Judge.

Sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

We affirm the judgment upon the opinion of the District Court. 263 F.Supp. 74 (D.S.C.1967).

Affirmed.
